channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Indian vibe-coding startup Emergent triples valuation to $300M with $70M fundraise
item.description: The funding comes as the startup claims it has scaled ARR to $50 million, and is targeting $100 million by April 2026.

item.title: You’ve Never Heard of China’s Greatest Sci-Fi Novel
item.description: Millions of words. Thousands of authors. The Morning Star of Lingao is barely known outside China—but it contains the secret to the country’s moderniz...

item.title: Your First Humanoid Robot Coworker Will Probably Be Chinese
item.description: Explosive acceleration, limited dexterity, eyes in the back of its head. What could possibly go wrong?

item.title: Netflix revises offer to pay all cash for Warner Bros to fend off Paramount
item.description: However, the streaming giant is still offering the same $27.75 the companies had agreed on for WBD's movie studio and streaming assets, and the deal c...

item.title: China’s Renewable Energy Revolution Is a Huge Mess That Might Save the World
item.description: A global onslaught of cheap Chinese green power is upending everything in its path. No one is ready for its repercussions.

item.title: Eat App wants a bite of India’s restaurant reservation business with an aquistion and Swiggy partnership
item.description: Eat App is making India its central focus to market its reservation and dine-in growth suite

item.title: China’s AI Boyfriend Business Is Taking On a Life of Its Own
item.description: Gen Z women in China are all in on digital companionship—even setting up dates with real-world versions of their AI boyfriends.

item.title: Netflix is rolling out a live voting feature
item.description: Netflix said it the feature will be available globally and it will tally votes in real-time

item.title: SpaceX didn’t properly inspect crane before collapse at Starbase, OSHA says
item.description: The federal safety agency has hit SpaceX with a $115,850 fine after finding seven "serious" violations during its investigation.

item.title: Jimmy Wales Will Never Edit Donald Trump’s Wikipedia Page: He ‘Makes Me Insane’
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Big Interview podcast, Wikipedia founder Jimmy Wales talks about maintaining neutrality in an online ecosystem increasin...
